column2: (looking out the window) Oh hey, you guys, look! Ugly Naked Guy is\nputting stuff in boxes!'
I'd say from the looks of it; our naked buddy is moving."
Ironically, most of the boxes seem to be labeled clothes.'
Ohh, I'm gonna miss that big old squishy butt."
And we're done with the chicken fried rice."
Hey! Hey! If he's moving, maybe I should try to get his place!"
Good idea! Yes!'
It would be so cool to live across from you guys!'
Hey, yeah! Then we could do that telephone thing! Y'know, you have a can,\nwe have a can and it's connected by a string!"
Or we can do the actual telephone thing.'
Oh my God! I love this apartment! Isn't it perfect?! I can't believe I\nnever realized how great it is!"
Well that is because your eye immediately goes to the big naked man.'
It's amazing! You better hurry up and fill out an application or I'm\ngonna beat you to it."
(laughing) Ohh. (Phoebe takes a couple of steps to the door and Ross\nquickly hurries out.)'
Well, I never thought I'd say this, but I'm gonna go use Ugly Naked\nGuy's bathroom. (Does so.)"
(looking out the window) Oh, look! There's Monica and Chandler! (Starts\nyelling.) Hey! Hey, you guys! Hey! (Chandler and Monica start taking each other's clothes\noff.) Ohh!! Ohh! Ahh-ahhh!!"
What?!'
(screaming) Ahhh!! Chandler and Monica!! Chandler and Monica!!'
Oh my God!'
CHANDLER AND MONICA!!!!'
OH MY GOD!!!'
OH!! MY EYES!!! MY EYES!!!!'
Phoebe!! Phoebe!! It's okay!! It's okay!!"
NO! THEY'RE DOING IT!!!"
I KNOW!! I KNOW!! I KNOW!'
YOU KNOW?!!!'
Yes, I know! And Joey knows! But Ross doesn't know so you have to stop\nscreaming!!"
(entering) What's going on?"
Ohhh!!!'
(trying to divert his attention from the window by jumping up and down)\nHI!! Hi! '
What?! What?!'
Nothing! Oh God, we're just so excited that you want to get this\napartment!"
Actually, it looks really good. (Turns towards the window and now Phoebe\nstarts jumping to divert his attention.)'
(Screaming incoherently.) Get in here!!! (Motions to join her and\nRachel.)'
You mean whenever Monica and Chandler where like y'know doing laundry or\ngoing grocery shopping or\xc2\x97Oh! All that time Monica spent on the phone with sad Linda\nfrom camp!"
Uh-huh, doing it. Doing it. Phone doing it.'
Oh! Oh, I can't believe it! I mean I think it's great! For him. She\nmight be able to do better."
(entering) Hey guys!'
Joey! Come here! Come here!'
What? What?'
Phoebe just found out about Monica and Chandler.'
You mean how they're friends and nothing more? (Glares at Rachel.)"
No. Joey, she knows! We were at Ugly Naked Guy's apartment and we\nsaw them doing it through the window. (Joey gasps) Actually, we saw them doing it up against\nthe window."
Okay, so now they know that you know and they don't know that Rachel\nknows?"
Yes, but y'know what? It doesn't matter who knows what. Now, enough of us\nknow that we can just tell them that we know! Then all the lying and the secrets would\nfinally be over!"
Or, we could not tell them we know and have a little fun of our\nown.'
Wh-what do you mean?'
Well y'know every time that they say that like they're doing laundry\nwe'll just give them a bunch of laundry to do."
Ohhh, I-I would enjoy that!'
No-no-no! No-no wait Rach, you know what would even be more fun? Telling\nthem.'
Ehhh, no, I wanna do Phoebe's thing."
I can't take any\xc2\x85"
No! You don't have to do anything! Just don't tell them that we know!"
Noo! I can't take any more secrets! (To Rachel) I've got your secrets.\nI've got their secrets. I got secrets of my own y'know!"
You don't have any secrets!"
Oh yeah? Well, you don't know about Hugsy, my bedtime penguin pal. (Joey\nshies away.)"
(To Phoebe) So umm, how-how are we gonna mess with them?'
Ugh.'
Well, you could use your position y'know as the roommate."
Okay.'
And then. I would use y'know the strongest tool at my disposal. My\nsexuality."
(entering) Hello children!'
Hey!'
Okay, watch, learn, and don't eat my cookie."
Hey.'
Hey! Ooh, wow that jacket looks great on you!'
Really?'
(feels his arm) Yeah the material feels so soft\xc2\x97hello Mr. Bicep!\nHave you been working out?'
Well, I try to y'know, squeeze things. (Phoebe giggles\nuncontrollably.) Are you okay?"
Well, if you really wanna know, I'm\xc2\x97Oh! I can't tell you this."
Phoebe, it's me. You can tell me anything."
Well actually you're the one person I can't tell this too. And the one\nperson I want to the most."
What's going on?"

I think it's just y'know that I haven't been with a guy in so long and
how sometimes you're looking for something and you just don\xc2\x92t even see that it's
right there in front of you sipping coffee\xc2\x97Oh no, have I said to much? Well it's just
something to think about. I know I will."
You are so cute! How did you get to be so cute?'
Well, my Grandfather was Swedish and my Grandmother was actually a\ntiny little bunny.'
Okay, now you're even cuter!!"
Y'know that is a popular opinion today I must say."
What?'
The weirdest thing happened at the coffee house, I think, I think\nPhoebe was hitting on me.'
What are you talking about?'
I'm telling you I think Phoebe thinks I'm foxy."
That's not possible!"
Ow!'
I'm sorry it's just, Phoebe just always thought you were, you were\ncharming in a, in a sexless kind of way."
Oh, y'know I-I can't hear that enough."
I'm sorry, I think that you just misunderstood her."
No, I didn't misunderstand, okay? She was all over me! She touched my\nbicep for crying out loud!"
This bicep?'
Well it's not flexed right now!"
Hey Mon, what are you doing now? Wanna come see a movie with us?'
Uhh, y'know actually I was gonna do some laundry."
Oh.'
Hey Chandler, wanna do it with me?'
Sure, I'll do it with ya."
Okay.'
Okay great, hold on a sec! (She runs to her room and returns carrying a\nhuge bag of laundry.) Oh, here you go! You don't mind do ya? That would really help me out\na lot! Thanks!"
I mean I-I don't I think I have enough quarters."
I have quarters! (She holds up a bag of quarters.)'
(entering) Hey!'
Hey Ross! Any word on the apartment yet?'
Well, I called over there and it turns out Ugly Naked Guy is subletting it\nhimself and he's already had like a hundred applicants."
Oh.'
No-no, I got the edge. I know it's not exactly ethical but I sent him a\nlittle bribe to "
Oh, is it that pinball machine with the big bow on it?'
No.'
That new mountain bike?'
No.'
Well what did you send?'
A basket of mini-muffins.'
But there's a whole table of mini-muffin baskets. Which one did you\nsend?"
The small one.'
What?! You-you actually thought that basket was gonna get you the\napartment?'
Well yeah! Someone sent us a basket at work once and people went crazy\nover those little muffins. It was the best day.'
Your work makes me sad.'
Oh man! I want that place so much!! I was so sure that was gonna work!\nThere's twelve bucks I'll never see again! (Exits.)"
All right honey, we'd better go if we wanna catch that movie."
Bye!'
Bye!'
Bye Chandler! (She walks up to him.) (Quietly.) I miss you already. (She\npinches his butt.)'
(after they've left) Okay, did you see that?! With the inappropriate\nand the pinching!!"
Actually, I did!'
Okay, so now do you believe that she's attracted to me?"
Ohhh, oh my God! Oh my God! She knows about us!'
Are you serious?'
Phoebe knows and she's just trying to freak us out! That's the only\nexplanation for it!"
(a little hurt) Okay but what about y'know my pinchable butt and my\nbulging biceps\xc2\x97She knows!"
(entering) Joey!'
Yeah?'
Phoebe knows about us!'
Well I didn't tell them!"
Them?! Who's them?"
Uhhh, Phoebe and Joey.'
Joey!'
And Rachel. I would've told you but they made me promise not to tell!"
Oh man!'
I'm sorry! But hey, it's over now, right? Because you can tell them that\nyou know they know and I can go back to knowing absolutely nothing!"
Unless\xc2\x85'
No! Not unless! Look this must end now!'
Oh man, they think they are so slick messing with us! But see\nthey don't know that we know that they know! So\xc2\x85"
Ahh yes, the messers become the messies!'
Noooo.'
Oh Ross, honey you gotta stop torturing yourself!'
Yeah, why don't you just find another apartment?"
Look I've already looked at like a thousand apartments this month and none\nof them even compares to that one!"
Y'know what you should do?"
Huh?'
You should find out what his hobbies are and then use that to bond with\nhim. Yeah! Like if I would strike up a conversation about say umm, sandwiches. Or uh, or\nmy underwear.'
I'm listening."
(To Ross) See?'
That is a great idea! And! I know Ugly Naked Guy because we've been\nwatching him for like five years so that gives me back my edge! Oh, let's see now\nhe had the trampoline."
He broke that.'
Well, he had gravity boots.'
Yeah, he broke those too.'
So he likes to break stuff.'
Okay, I've got to go pick up Ben but I-I will figure something out. (He\nopens the door and stops.) Hey, didn't he used to have a cat?"
I wouldn't bring that up, it would probably just bum him out."
Yeah, poor cat, never saw that big butt coming.'
Right. (Exits.)'
Hello! (Listens) Oh yeah! Hey! Hold on a second she's right here! (To\nPhoebe) It's Chandler."
(in a sexy voice) Oh? (Takes the phone from Rachel.) Hello you.'
Hello Phoebe, I've been thinking about you all day. (He's holding the\nphone so that Monica can hear it as well.)"
Eh?'
Well you know that thing you said before, I'd be lying if I said I\nwasn't intrigued."
Really?'
Yeah, listen, Joey isn't gonna be here tonight so why don't you come\nover and I'll let you uh, feel my bicep. Or maybe more."
I'll have to get back to you on that. Okay, bye! (Hangs up.) Oh my God!\nHe wants me to come over and feel his bicep and more!"
Are you kidding?!'
No!'
I can not believe he would do that to Mon\xc2\x97Whoa! (She stops suddenly\nand slowly turns to point at Joey. Joey is avoiding her eyes.) Joey, do they know that we\nknow?'
No.'
Joey!'
They know you know.'
Ugh, I knew it! Oh I cannot believe those two!'
God, they thought they can mess with us! They're trying to mess with\nus?! They don't know that we know they know we know! (Joey just shakes his head.) Joey,\nyou can't say anything!"
I couldn't even if I wanted too."

Good evening, sir. My name is Ross Geller. I'm one of the people who
applied for the apartment. And I-I realize that the competition is fierce but\xc2\x97I'm
sorry. I, I can't help but notice you're naked and (He claps his hands.) I applaud you.
Man, I wish I was naked. I mean, this-this looks so great. That is how God intended it."
(in the kitchen with Chandler) Look at them, they're-they're panicked!"
Oh yeah, they're totally gonna back down!"
Oh yeah!'
All right. All right! If he wants a date? He's gonna get a date. All\nright, I'm gonna go in."
All right. Be sexy.'
(laughs) Please.'
So Chandler, I-I'd love to come by tonight."
(initially worried, but gets over it) Really?'
Oh absolutely. Shall we say, around seven?'
Yes.'
Good. I'm really looking forward to you and me having sexual\nintercourse."
(looking out the window) Hey-hey, check it out! Check it out! Ugly Naked\nGuy has a naked friend!'
Oh yeah! (She gasps.) Oh my God! That is our friend! (Monica\ncovers her face.) It's Naked Ross! (Monica turns and buries her face in Chandler's\nshoulder.)"
Yeah, it is! Naked Ross!!'
Show time!'
Okay, Rachel, get me perfume!'
Okay! (She runs to get some.)'
And Joey, get me a bottle of wine and glasses? (He begrudgingly does\nso.)'
All right, it'll be great! You just make her think you wanna have sex\nwith her! It'll totally freak her out!"
Okay, listen, how far am I gonna have to go with her?'
Relax, she-she's gonna give in way before you do!"
How do you know?!'
Because you're on my team! And my team always wins!"
At this?!'
Just go get some! (Kisses him.) Go! (She runs to hide in the bathroom.)'
(handing her the wine) Okay honey, now I'm gonna try to listen from\nright here!"
Okay.'
Okay? Whoa, wait! (She undoes one button on Phoebe's dress.)"
Good idea! '
Yeah, oh wait! (She goes for another one.) '
Oh now, don't give away the farm!"
Phoebe.'
Chandler.'
Come on in.'
I was going too. (They go inside and he closes the door.) Umm, I brought\nsome wine. Would you like some?'
Sure.'
So, here we are. Nervous?'
Me? No. You?'
No, I want this to happen.'
So do I.'
I'm gonna put on some music."
Maybe, maybe I'll dance for you. (She starts doing a rather suggestive\nand seductive dance that's silly at the same time.)"
You look good.'
Thanks! Y'know, that when you say things like that it makes me wanna rip\nthat sweater vest right off!"
Well, why don't we move this into the bedroom?"
Really?'
Oh, do you not want to?'
No. No! It's just y'know first, I wanna take off all my clothes and have\nyou rub lotion on me."
(swallowing hard) Well that would be nice. I'll go get the lotion."
Listen, this is totally getting out of hand! Okay? She wants me to put\nlotion on her! '
She's bluffing!"
Look, she's not backing down! She went like this! (He does a little\nmimic of her dance.)"
He's not backing down. He went to get lotion."
(entering the hall) Oh man! Aren't you guys done yet?! I wanna sit in my\nchair!"
Joey look, just look at it this way, the sooner Phoebe breaks Chandler\nthe sooner this is all over and out in the open.'
Ooh!'
Okay!'
I like that! (To Phoebe) Oh, okay! Show him your bra! He's afraid of bras!\nCan't work 'em! (He swiftly rips open the front of Phoebe's dress revealing her bra.)"
Joey! (Examining the dress.) Wow, you didn\xc2\x92t rip off any buttons.'
It's not my first time."
You go back out there and you seduce her till she cracks!'
Okay, give me a second! (Pause) Did you clean up in here?'
Of course.'
Oh, you're-you're going?"
Umm, not without you, lover. (She slowly walks over to him and is\nshowcasing her bra.) So, this is my bra.'
(swallowing hard) It's very, very nice. Well, come here. I'm very were\ngonna be having all the sex."
You should be. I'm very bendy. (Pause) I'm gonna kiss you now."
Not if I kiss you first.'
Ooh.'
Well, I guess there's nothing left for us to do but-but kiss."
Here it comes. Our first kiss.'
Okay! Okay! Okay! You win! You win!! I can't have sex with ya!"
And why not?!'
Because I'm in love with Monica!!"
You're-you're what?!"
Love her! That's right, I\xc2\x85LOVE\xc2\x85HER!!! I love her!! (They\nwalk together and hug.) I love you, Monica."
I love you too Chandler. (They kiss.)'
I just\xc2\x97I thought you guys were doing it, I didn't know you were in\nlove!"
Dude!'
And hats off to Phoebe. Quite a competitor. (Pause) And might I say\nyour breasts are still showing.'
God! (She turns and buttons up.)'
All right! So that's it! It's over! Everybody knows!"
Well actually, Ross doesn't."
Yes, and we'd appreciate it if no one told him yet."
A new place for a new Ross. I'm gonna have you and all the guys from work\nover once it's y'know, furnished."
I must say it's nice to see you back on your feet."
Well I am that. And that whole rage thing is definitely behind me.'
I wonder if its time for you to rejoin our team at the museum?'

Oh Donald that-that would be great. I am totally ready to come back to\nwork. I\xc2\x97What? (He notices something through the window.) No! Wh\xc2\x85 What are you\ndoing?!! (Dr. Ledbetter is slowly backing away.) GET OFF MY SISTER!!!!!!!!!!!!! '
